headline: JPMorgan and Piper Sandler Raise PT on Occidental Petroleum Corporation (OXY)
summary: Occidental Petroleum Corporation (NYSE:OXY), with its low price-to-earnings multiple and significant presence in Warren Buffett’s investment portfolio, secures a spot on our list of the 12 Cheap Value Stocks to Buy Now According to Warren Buffett. On July 15, 2025, JPMorgan increased its price target on Occidental Petroleum Corporation (NYSE:OXY) from $47 to $48, maintaining […]
